house_listing.house_description: This single family home has 3 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Garage Door Opener, Kitchen Island,Library, Microwave, Pantry, Wet Bar
